about_the_game:
About the Game

Musical Chairs is an online multiplayer based on the world-famous party game. Cue the music, start playing and make sure to catch a seat!
Run around at school with up to 8-players and try to become the teachers' favourite by competing with the other students.

Game modes

At the playground different games involving music and chairs are played. Like Hide & Seat where your goal is to find the hidden chairs.
Expect surprising gameplay while running around. We believe the game modes will continually grow and evolve so you return to school after a holiday.

Ingame Purchases

We added quirky-looking skins for those who like to have a different outfit! Other options will be revealed later.

Twitch

The game design is helpful for Twitch streamers because of the interactive gameplay that leads to an engaging audience.
The viewers interact to either help or sabotage the gameplay on the fly, by switching key inputs, throwing water balloons to slow you down or adding an extra chair to help you score points.
